centralized.title: Centralized
centralized.feature1: Completely free to play, no payment required.
centralized.feature2: You don't need to own any Web 3.0 wallet.
centralized.feature3: We store your password and username in our centralized database.
centralized.feature4: If our API goes down, you wonâ€™t be able to play compared to other bundles.
centralized.feature5: You will see side panel advertisements.
centralized.feature6: You will occasionally receive pop-up ads.
centralized.feature8: You receive 100% Aexis Pass XP points.

decentralized.title: Half-Decentralized
decentralized.feature1: Completely free to play, no payment required.
decentralized.feature2: Your account is secured via blockchain authentication.
decentralized.feature4: You will never receive pop-up ads.
decentralized.feature5: In the future, you will be able to play even if our API goes down.
decentralized.feature7: Earn up to 105% Aexis Pass XP points.
decentralized.feature8: Requires a Web 3.0 wallet, such as MetaMask.

vip.title: Supra-Decentralized
vip.feature1: In the future, you will be able to play even if our API goes down.
vip.feature3: We will never store any of your personal information.
vip.feature4: Everything is completely transparent and visible on the blockchain.
vip.feature5: Receive 1 free Treasure daily upon logging in and claiming it.
vip.feature7: Earn up to 150% Aexis Pass XP points.
vip.feature8: You will pay a minimal $Supra fee on your transactions.

profile.acceptTOS: By checking this box, you accept our Terms Of Services.
profile.noChangeWarning: You won't be able to change your class or race once you proceed to create your hero
